//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   sampler2D g_DepthSampler;
//   float4 g_ForceAlphaColor;
//   sampler2D g_FramebufferSampler;
//   float4 g_LightScatteringColor;
//   row_major float4x4 g_MtxView;
//   float4 g_ViewportSize;
//   float4 mrgDistortionParam;
//   sampler2D sampDif;
//   sampler2D sampNrm;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                   Reg   Size
//   ---------------------- ----- ----
//   g_ViewportSize         c24      1
//   g_LightScatteringColor c75      1
//   g_ForceAlphaColor      c89      1
//   g_MtxView              c90      3
//   mrgDistortionParam     c150     1
//   sampDif                s0       1
//   sampNrm                s1       1
//   g_FramebufferSampler   s11      1
//   g_DepthSampler         s12      1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c0, 2, -1, 1, -2
    def c1, 0.5, -0.5, 0, 4
    dcl_texcoord v0.xy
    dcl_texcoord2 v1.xyz
    dcl_texcoord3 v2.xyz
    dcl_texcoord4_pp v3.xy
    dcl_texcoord8 v4.xyz
    dcl_color_pp v5
    dcl_texcoord6_pp v6.xy
    dcl vPos.xy
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s11
    dcl_2d s12
    nrm_pp r0.xyz, v4
    texld_pp r1, v0, s1
    mul_pp r1.x, r1.w, r1.x
    mad_pp r1.xy, r1, c0.x, c0.y
    mul_pp r0.xyz, r0, r1.y
    nrm_pp r2.xyz, v2
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r1.x, r2, r0
    dp2add_pp r0.w, r1, -r1, c0.z
    rsq_pp r0.w, r0.w
    rcp_pp r0.w, r0.w
    nrm_pp r1.xyz, v1
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r0.w, r1, r0
    mul_pp r0.yw, r0.y, c91.xxzy
    mad_pp r0.xy, r0.x, c90, r0.ywzw
    mad_pp r0.xy, r0.z, c92, r0
    mul_pp r0.xy, r0, c150.w
    mul r0.z, c24.w, vPos.y
    mad_pp r1.y, r0.z, c0.w, r0.y
    dp2add_pp r1.x, vPos.x, c24.z, r0.x
    add r0.xy, r1, c0.yzzw
    mad r0.xy, r0, c1, c1.x
    texld r1, r0, s12
    texld_pp r0, r0, s11
    rcp r0.w, v6.y
    mad r1.x, v6.x, -r0.w, r1.x
    mad_pp r0.w, v6.x, -r0.w, c0.z
    rcp r0.w, r0.w
    mul r0.w, r0.w, c150.y
    max r2.x, r1.x, c1.z
    mul_pp r0.w, r0.w, r2.x
    add r1.xyz, r0, -c150.z
    add_pp r2.xyz, -r0, c0.z
    add_pp r2.xyz, r2, r2
    texld_pp r3, v0, s0
    add_pp r4.xyz, -r3, c0.z
    mad_pp r2.xyz, r2, -r4, c0.z
    cmp_pp r2.xyz, r1, r2, c1.z
    mul_pp r0.xyz, r0, r3
    mul_pp r3.w, r3.w, v5.w
    add_pp r0.xyz, r0, r0
    cmp_pp r0.xyz, r1, c1.z, r0
    add_pp r0.xyz, r2, r0
    lrp_pp r3.xyz, r0.w, v5, r0
    mul_pp r0, r3, c89
    min_pp r1, r0, c1.w
    mul_pp r0.xyz, c75, v3.y
    mad_pp oC0.xyz, r1, v3.x, r0
    mov_pp oC0.w, r1.w

// approximately 56 instruction slots used (4 texture, 52 arithmetic)
